              The Crow [Collector's Edition].1994.x264.DTS-VGL


Movie Title: The Crow

Director: Alex Proyas

Cast: Brandon Lee, Michael Wincott, Bai Ling, Ernie Hudson


This is a DVDRip of the film in MKV format. You will need VLC Player to view the movie.

For even better results, and in order to enable H.264 playback in Windows Media Player the following software is suggested:

CoreAVC
Haali Media Splitter
AC3 Filter
VobSub & VSFilter (For the Subtitles)



Language: English

Optional Subtitles [Included in the Matroska Container]:
English, Dutch, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Portuguese, Spanish, Swedish

Instructions using the subtitle streams:

----------------------------------------------------
Viewing the subtitles with VLC Player:
----------------------------------------------------

Video-->Subtitles Track-->Select

Subtitle Screenshot for VLC Player:   <a href="
http://www.lookpic.com/files/1195.JPG" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.lookpic.com/files/1195.JPG</a>

--------------------------------------------------------------
Viewing the subtitles with Haali Media Splitter
--------------------------------------------------------------

Right click on Haali tray icon-->Select subtitles

**NOTE**

VobSub & VSFilter must be installed

Subtitle Screenshot for Haali Media Splitter:   <a href="
http://www.lookpic.com/files/2143.JPG" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.lookpic.com/files/2143.JPG</a>


----------------------------------------------------------------
                        ** N O T E S **
----------------------------------------------------------------

I used "The Crow: 2 DVD Special Edition" A.K.A. 
"The Crow (Miramax/Dimension Collector's Series)" as my source.

-- Digitally Remastered: Sharpness and detail are noticeably improved, and the image looks consistently more well-defined, even in the darkest of
scenes (of which there are quite a few in a film like this one).

-- Widescreen(1.85:1): The film received a new anamorphic transfer, which preserves its 1.85:1 theatrical aspect ratio. Dimension's new anamorphic transfer of "The Crow" is a great deal more enjoyable than the original non-anamorphic presentation.

-- DTS 5.1 : I muxed the DTS audio stream, intact from the DVD.
6 Channels(DTS-ES Matrix), Constant Bit Rate [768 Kbps]
The audio stream alone is 548 Mb.

-- Credit to "Voorhees26" for the source (NTSC DVD)
